name: Aaru Mixed Rice
desc: A large serving of filling staple food. In this dish that combines rice, noodles, and beans together, the secret of great taste lies in the sweet and sour flavor imparted by tomatoes. Owing to its common nature and low price, this dish is a great choice for sating one's hunger â€” which is one of the key reasons why this recipe has spread from Aaru Village to the rest of Sumeru.

customize.name: Recipe: Aaru Mixed Rice
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Aaru Mixed Rice.

customize.name: Rice
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Glabrous Beans
customize.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Delicious Aaru Mixed Rice
customize.desc: A large serving of filling staple food. Each grain of rice is distinct and evenly coated in flavorful sauce as you spoon them into your mouth. No oily meats were used to make this dish, and yet its flavor is more alluring still. This dish stacks flavor like the endless dunes themselves, bringing a most unique satisfaction.

customize.name: Suspicious Aaru Mixed Rice
customize.desc: A large serving of filling staple food. In your hurry, you did not mix the various ingredients well before eating, resulting in a ridiculously thick tomato flavor on one side of the rice, and an utter blandness on the other... Best you mix it a bit better next time.

customize.name: Candace
customize.desc: A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.

customize.name: Utmost Care
customize.desc: Candace's specialty. The aroma of this dish hits your nose long before it can be plated up. It would seem that Candace's adept guardianship also extends to sustaining appetites... But, uh, this really is an extraordinary amount of Aaru Mixed Rice. How are you supposed to deal with this mountain of "overflowing consideration"?
